alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 8:58AM CDT until March 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-260200- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.W.0003.230325T1506Z-230326T0600Z/ /CANO2.1.ER.230325T1506Z.230325T1800Z.230326T0000Z.NO/ 858 AM CDT Sat Mar 25 2023 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, The creek reaches bankfull levels in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. High stages on small feeder streams could further result in greater-than-bankfull overflows to mainstem bottomlands. Croplands... pastures... and some secondary rural roads along and near Clear Boggy Creek are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 26.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
